mapper.select: SELECT * FROM PRODUCT WHERE PRODUCT_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY PRODUCT_NO DESC
SELECT * FROM PRODUCT_IMG WHERE PRODUCT_NO = #{productNo} AND STATUS = 'Y' AND IMG_TYPE = 2
SELECT P.* , PI.PRODUCT_IMG_PATH AS THUMBNAIL_IMG FROM PRODUCT P JOIN PRODUCT_IMG PI ON P.PRODUCT_NO = PI.PRODUCT_NO WHERE P.PRODUCT_NO = #{productNo} AND PI.IMG_TYPE = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT (PRODUCT_NO, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_EXPLAIN, PRODUCT_PRICE, PRODUCT_STOCK, CATEGORY, DISCOUNT, GENDER, TOP_NOTE, MIDDLE_NOTE, BASE_NOTE, PRODUCT_STATUS) VALUES(SEQ_PRODUCT_NO.NEXTVAL, #{productName}, #{productExplain}, #{productPrice}, #{productStock}, #{category}, #{discount}, #{gender}, #{topNote}, #{middleNote}, #{baseNote}, default)

INSERT INTO PRODUCT_IMG (PRODUCT_IMG_NO, PRODUCT_IMG_PATH, PRODUCT_IMG_ORIGIN, PRODUCT_IMG_CHANGE, IMG_TYPE, PRODUCT_NO, STATUS) VALUES (SEQ_IMG_NO.NEXTVAL, #{productImgPath}, #{productImgOrigin}, #{productImgChange}, #{imgType}, SEQ_PRODUCT_NO.CURRVAL, 'Y')
mapper.update: UPDATE PRODUCT SET PRODUCT_NAME = #{productName}, PRODUCT_EXPLAIN = #{productExplain}, PRODUCT_PRICE = #{productPrice}, PRODUCT_STOCK = #{productStock}, DISCOUNT = #{discount}, CATEGORY = #{category}, GENDER = #{gender}, TOP_NOTE = #{topNote}, MIDDLE_NOTE = #{middleNote}, BASE_NOTE = #{baseNote}, PRODUCT_STATUS = #{productStatus} WHERE PRODUCT_NO = #{productNo}
